tool_description: Monitors and calculates reading streaks, including current streaks, longest streaks, and streak statistics.

user_id.description: Unique identifier for the user whose streak to monitor

minimum_threshold.description: Minimum pages or minutes required to count as a reading day

threshold_type.description: Type of threshold: pages or minutes

error_messages: Invalid user_id: User identifier cannot be empty or invalid
Invalid minimum_threshold: Must be a positive integer
Invalid threshold_type: Must be either 'pages' or 'minutes'
No reading data: No reading history found for the specified user
usage: Provide user_id to monitor reading streaks. Optionally set minimum_threshold and threshold_type to define what constitutes a reading day.

longest_streak.description: Longest streak ever achieved by the user

streak_start_date.description: Start date of the current streak

streak_status.description: Current streak status (active, broken, or starting)

days_since_last_read.description: Number of days since last reading session
